Aunque es secuela de 'Portal', este juego no deja de sorprendernos a los que empezamos a resolver cámaras depruebas con la primera parte. Extendido hasta el infinito gracias al uso de 'Workshop' y con posibilidades de juego cooperativo, es sin duda una opción no solo recomendable, si no que se tercia hasta necesaria para entender el desarrollo de los videojuegos. Un 9 sobre 10.
now your thinking with portals
A great puzzle game! It can stump you sometimes, but it flows well and its easy after thinking for a few minutes.

If you've played Portal 1, you'll understand why this is a must... If not, WHY NOT?! Anyway, this sequel to one of the internet's favourite phenomenons is a wacky trip back into the bowels of Aperture Science Labs to have some fun with science's headmistress - Glados. The story remains dark and humourous with even more lore delving deeper into Aperture's history. This game includes a variety of new gimicks to keep things fresh for the veterans, and to start things off with a bang for newcomers. The level of challenge remains the same as before, ranging from simple but fun for casual gamers to unforgiving but rewarding for hardcore gamers. WIth the introduction of multiplayer the fun truely only stops when you and your buddy's get into a fight about who messed up first, and even then you just wanna keep going. If you're looking for a pretty game, with a rich lore, amusing story, and fun puzzle-solving gameplay-- Look no further.
clasic game making a return

Portal 2 je NEJLEPŠÍ hra, co jsem kdy hrál. A také i nejlepší hra, která byla zatím vytvořena! Není se čemu divit, hra obdržela více než 70 různých ocenění! První Portal byla zajímavá logická hra, ale byla hodně krátká, za ty 3-4 hodiny hraní, to ale stálo za to. Takže se Valve jednou rozhodlo, že udělají Portal 2 (aby i tato hra měla svoje pokračování.) Příběh vám nechci prozrazovat, protože by to zkazilo herní zážitek. Co ale můžu říct je, že ve hře opět najdete Chell, a novou postavu jménem Wheatley. Nejedná se o žádný ULTRA-VELKÝ-Příběh, který by byl stejně velký jako ten ve Final Fantasy, Epickou Akci, nebo Exploze ve stylu Michaela Baye, místo toho ve hře najdete charismatické postavy, perfektní humor, který pobaví snad každého, nebo skvěle udělané úrovně. Ve hře je také možnost hrát Kooperatovní mód, takže pokud máte přítele s kterým hrát, užijete si spoustu srandy. Hra má taky velký počet achievementů, které herní dobu zdélší. Také máte možnost vytvořit vaše úrovně, které pak můžete zveřejnit na Steam Workshop, a pak si třeba zahrát úrovně ostatních lidí. Některé jsou dobré, některé jsou těžké, některé jsou lehké, některé jsou šílené, a v některých tam někdo nic nedal. Také má hra zajímavé Easter Eggy, nebudu vám je tu ale spoilerovat. Jedinou věc kterou bych hře vytknul, je krátkost příběhu, ta je mezi 6-11 hodinami.

[b][u]Klady[/u][/b]
◘ Hratelnost
◘ Příběh
◘ Coop
◘ Komunita
◘ Jednoduchý, intuitivní editor levelů, Workshop
◘ Jednoduchá mechanika, která neomrzí

[b][u]Zápory[/u][/b]
◘ Poměrně krátká dějová linie

[b][u]Hodnocení[/u][/b]

No esperaba que fuesen a superar a Portal, pero lo consiguieron. Los puzles pueden ofrecer mayor dificultad en algunos casos dados a los nuevos elementos. Aún así, sigo opinando que Portal gozaba de una mayor dificultad. Este dispone en cambio de un mejor aspecto gráfico y una jugabilidad más fluida. El modo cooperativo es también bastante bueno y novedoso. Lo recomiendo siempre y cuando te hayas pasado el primero.
grrrroooovy

Portal 2 is stunning. The surfaces render beautifully and I found myself just looking around at the environment. The level design and puzzles are top notch; I really had to think my way through many of them. They weren't too hard but they could definitely force you to think outside of the box in order to move on to the next area.

The clincher for me was the humor. It wasn't trashy or vulgar but genuinely intelligent, funny stuff. "For science" is now engrained in my lexicon. You'll see what I mean from the opening sequence. Highly recommended.

Sincerely, I played a lots of videogames since the 90's and Portal 2 it's one of the best game I ever played. I will write a lot of all I  like in Portal 2 but only the fact of playing, what I feel playing, it really express or describe how great it is.

A game that provides an excellent singleplayer and multiplayer experience and is also a great mental exercise, Portal 2 is a very worthwhile purchase. The singleplayer campaign is a good deal of fun, with a creative story and an enjoyable cast of characters, and the coupling of Steam Workshop with user-created maps makes the cooperative multiplayer an experience of functionally infinite content. 

Give it a buy.

Portal 2 has one of the best storylines and especially dialogues I've ever seen, and I will never ever forget the ending, because it is the absolutely best game ending ever.

Portal 2 is the phenomenal sequal to Valve's award-winning Portal. 

Many were dubious about Portal 2, prior to the release, due to how amazing Portal was, feeling that nothing could live up to it, unless the game were truly amazing. Valve managed to pull that off by miles.

Portal 2 is hugely fun, with a remarkable and hilarious storyline which blends so perfectly from the first game it's almost seamless, with Stephen Merchant bringing an extra layer of awesome as the memorable character, "Wheatley". 

On top of the great story, you have the map maker, which provides hours and hours of enjoyment on top of the original packaged challenges. 

Get it.

Второй портал, так же как и первый, был пройден 2 раза в сингле и коопе. По сравнению с первым сюжетная линию стала гораздо интересней и я бы даже сказал более "замудренной". Совсем другое дело кооп, он получился настолько коротким на сколько была сделана первая часть. Разрабы решили это исправить и ввели открытую лабу для создания комнат самими игроками. Скажу одно, как бы игроки не старались, но всё уже не то (ИМХО). В итоге портал как таковой закончился. Дальше скорее всего будут сиквелы не такими......
Стоит заметить что тортик нам так и не дали, а вот брата-кубика мы спасли)
This is JUST so freaking cool!

8/10 Играть в обязательном порядке! Превосходное продолжение первой части, это - уже полноценная игра, а не тот "пробный камень", каким был первый Portal. Тогда разработчики только прощупывали жанр, а тут - сработали в полную силу. Своеобразная атмосфера,  неповторимый юмор и приятная глазу графика. Эта игра не оставит вас без новых впечатлений.
SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!

Another one of my favorites. I have gone through this one twice, and have watched other people play it. If you haven't, play the first one before this one. Not because you really need to to understand this one to be honest, but because it has amazing dialog and I think that playing this first with all the new additions might sour the experience of the first one.

That being said, the point is mostly the same. Use a portal opening device to get around platforms and hazards and make your way to your target.

Infinitely superior to the first game, this one adds a lot more mechanics to the puzzles and blows the already great comedy through the roof with the new eccentric characters it introduces.

Every line of dialog in this game is a gem. You haven't lived until you hear an eccentric quasi scientist corporate rant about life, lemons and lemonade.

Also, if you are really into the puzzle solving and you can never have enough, it supports user made scenarios, and there are even great full mods with their own stories out there.

Valve has taught us that sequels can be amazing! Portal 2 is entertaining in every possible way. It combines challenging puzzles, humour, and even a little glimpse into history. Lovely game. 10/10. The only flaw might be the last scene--I hate timed missions (and Portal had this problem too). The rest of the game is flawless. No bugs, no crashes, just pure brain-melting fun. 10/10.

Portal 2, des graphismes vraiment magnifiques, une bande super bien travaillée, musiques également, une jouabilitée super bien faite comme l'histoire qui est superbe avec des rebondissement totalement imprévisible, une durée de vie plutot longue avec un mode co op extra. Pour son prix, c'est vraiment un jeu incroyable que je conseille absolument, surtout qu'il est souvent en solde. Il est encore mieu que le 1 qui était déja épic, de plus on peut creer des niveau qu'on peut partager en ligne, cet outil a été ajouter gratuitement (un mot casi innexistant en matière d'ajout, de DLC...). C'est un jeu trés bien entretenu avec des mises a jours réguliere, pas comme certains. 
Valve>All>Activition.
Achetez le, il est enorme, honnêtement je ne trouve pas de défauts, le solo est a refaire plein de foi pour son ambiance énorme.

DISPATCH REPORT #002
Un degno seguito del primo capitolo.
E sono pochi i giochi che riescono a superare un colossal precedente.
Per quanto il gioco possa sembrare, ahimè peccato, ai più banale, in realtà saprà immergervi al suo interno, stimolare i neuroni (per chi ancora ne abbia qualcuno rimanente considerando i tempi in cui viviamo), divertire chi capisca un po' di sarcasmo ed emozionare chi riesca a seguire la storia.
Cosa rende eccezionale un gioco dove tutto quello che dovete fare è sparare portali?
Mappe fantastiche e una storyline eccezionale.
E non dimentichiamoci della cooperativa, anche lei niente male.
Finendolo non ho che potuto pensare a una e una sola cosa
E P I C O.
Consigliatissimo a tutti coloro che hanno già giocato il primo.

[b]Portal 2 is an awesome game![/b] It's got your good old valve physics engine. Thanks to the Steam Workshop, you can download limitless custom made puzzles or make some all on your own with the puzzle/level editor.The co-op is really nice and gets you and a friend to work together in a different way compared to other co-op games (must be because portals don't follow conventional physics) It's a well polished Valve game. Definitely worth it!

Очень интересная игра, которая заставляет напрячь мозги))) Valve в очередной раз доказали, что их игры - это произведение исскуства, и Portal 2 не исключение. Простенькая логическая аркада Portal переросла в крупный проект с уникальным, полным тайн и загадок, миром. Сюжет завораживает, диалоги наполнены юмором, загадки интересны, озвучка персонажей на высоте, графика радует глаз))) Эту игру хочется проходить снова и снова, тем более в ней присутствует отличный кооператив, за которым можно провести огромное количество времени. Всем рекомендую эту игру))))

Мало того, что в игре отличный сингл, и второй Портал - первая головоломка, в которую я играл после первого Портала. Так в игре и отличный кооп (как говорят), и, что я открыл для себя спустя полгода после последней игры, - огромная мастерская. Созданные игроками тесты - это целый новый мир игры, в чём я убедился буквально за пару часов. Это всерьёз и надолго.
